revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Wippies |model=BWA iBox |revision=V1.0 (BeWAN) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=07/2007 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_anuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=ARV4510PW |manuf_rev=-A-LF-L3 |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem,analog phone gateway |fcc_id=RAXWN4401CARC |pcb_id=141451A20000J |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Infineon |cpu1_model=PSB 50702;XWAY DANUBE, PSB 50702 E, V1.3; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Arcadyan WN4401C |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2413 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Infineon |sw_model=ADM6996I |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wippies HomeBox}} :[http://www.arcadyan.com/english/products/product_detail.asp?PROD_L1ID=00000003&PROD_ID=00000024 Product page] {{•}} [https://www.scribd.com/document/34223/BeWAN-Ibox-Introduction Manual] "P/N: 141451A20000J R01" is silkscreened on the board. :OEM: [[Arcadyan]] ARV4510PW-A-LF-L3 (''Astoria Networks'') There is a VIA VT6212L USB 2.0 controller on-board. {{see also|Wippies WifiBox (APG61)}} Wippies HomeBox - [http://forum.wippies.com/wiki/Homebox_-_Hardware Hardware on the '''Wippies''' wiki] *[http://code.google.com/p/quickanddirty/wiki/WippiesHomeBox On the '''Google Code''' wiki] *[https://openwrt.org/toh/arcadyan/arv4510pw ''ARV4510PW'' the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=15934 Router based on the Infineon Danube] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=155438 ''Bewan iBox'' on the '''OpenWrt''' forums] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=20044&start=30 ''Homebox/Wifibox'' on the '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[https://murobbs.muropaketti.com/threads/bewan-ibox-firmis-elisa-viihde-wippies-etc.582189/page-2 ''BeWAN iBox'' on '''MuroBBS'''] • [http://listing.driveragent.com/c/pci_print/168c/001a 168c:001a] 
Ethernet controller [0200]: Atheros Communications Inc. AR2413/AR2414 
  Wireless Network Adapter [AR5005G(S) 802.11bg] [168c:001a] (rev 01)
  Subsystem: Accton Technology Corporation Device [1113:4413]
===See also=== *[[Arcadyan ARV4510PW]] - [[Arcadyan ARV7510PW]] ([https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/arcadyan/arv7510pw ''OpenWrt'' wiki]) *[[Arcadyan ARV4518PW]] - ([[SMC SMC7908A-ISP]], [[AirTies WAV-221]]) *[[Arcadyan ARV4518PW2]], [[Arcadyan ARV7518PW]] - [[Infineon]] PSB 50702 *[[Wippies WifiBox (APG61)]] • FCC ID: RAXWG4005G • [http://www.arcadyan.com/english/products/product_detail.asp?PROD_L1ID=00000002&PROD_ID=00000007 PPage] • [https://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=20044&start=45 DD-WRT] :([[Belkin F5D7230-4 v7]], [[USRobotics USR5463]], [[Philips SNB5600/00]]) *[[SMC SMC2804WBR v1]] • FCC ID: HEDWG4005ACC ([[Accton WN4401]]) :([[Belkin F5D7630]], [[3Com 3CRADSL72]], [[3Com 3CRWE754G72]]) *[[SMC SMC7804WBRA]] - CPU: [[Samsung]] S3C2510A01 (ARM0403) :Flash: 2MB (AM29LV160MB-90EI), RAM: 16MB (IC42S16400-7T) :Wireless: [[Intersil]] ISL3880IK/ISL3680IR (MiniPCI) • [https://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=375611 DD-WRT] • [http://www.smc.com/files/AW/DS_SMC7804WBRA_FINAL.pdf DS] ==Images== via [http://web.archive.org/web/20100908082449/http://www.mobilabredband.se/files.php?p=%2FWippies MobilabredBand (archive.org)] File:Wippies BWA iBox V1p0 external.jpg|external angled File:Wippies BWA iBox V1p0 back.jpg|unit back File:Wippies BWA iBox V1p0 sideUSB.jpg|side USB port File:Wippies BWA iBox V1p0 panel.jpg|panel File:Wippies BWA iBox V1p0 front.jpg|front File:Wippies BWA iBox V1p0 bottom.jpg|bottom [[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]] File:Wippies BWA iBox V1p0 board top.jpg|board top File:Wippies BWA iBox V1p0 board top2.jpg|board top, shot 2 File:Wippies BWA iBox V1p0 board bot.jpg|board bottom [[Has images::internal| ]]
